data.name: Ocean Hell
data.detailed_description:
Ocean Hell is a multiplayer and single player survival game were your stuck in abandoned underwater research facility. Your main objective is to escape.
-Survive
Try to find food or water because your are going to need it. There's only a limited amount of food and water. There's also some creatures that are hungry, mutant rats and sharks.

-Craft
Using the craft mechanic players can create weapons and tools. And they can craft equipment too.

-Hunt
There's a lot of creatures onboard that might be eatable when cooked. So craft a weapon and start hunting.

-Multiplayer
Play with friends and hunt together all survival games are fun with friends.

data.short_description: Ocean Hell is a multiplayer survival adventure game where the objective is to escape the under sea research facility your stuck in. Play with friends or play single player in this horror survival game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, 11 (Only 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 8130U(2Cores, 2.3GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1024
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final
